main.bio: My name is Gianluca, I'm an MSc student in Computer Science and i love challenges, JS and Computer/network security. I'm an ecologist and activist for the international youth movement Friday's for Future.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

testimonials.text: Your software is good. Need a little bit of more work to do but we definitely gonna sell your software
I really loved your research on Security Vulnerabilities on Autonomous Vehicles. I wanna offer you the possibility to extend your research and publish it.
Nothing to say, your calculator project is great.
